version_description:
NEW ADVENTURE TIME GAME! The Cartoon Network App now has a brand-new Adventure Time game called Messed Up Magic. Make your way through matching mayhem courtesy of Magic Man!

We also updated the functionality of the provider picker and squashed a few minor bugs.

Keep sending us your feedback, and we'll keep making the Cartoon Network App better and better!

UNLOCKED EPISODES! Now you can watch Unlocked Episodes without any login or authentication. Enjoy a selection of full episodes from some of your favorite Cartoon Network shows any time you want! Just look for the episodes without a key. (Episodes with a key still require your TV provider info.)

Keep sending us your feedback, and we'll keep making the Watch Cartoon Network app better and better!

UNLOCKED EPISODES! Now you can watch Unlocked Episodes without any login or authentication. Enjoy full episodes of your favorite Cartoon Network shows any time you want!

We also worked on a few minor issues and miscellaneous bug fixes, so your experience should be smoother than ever.

Keep sending us your feedback, and we'll keep making the Watch Cartoon Network app better and better!

UNLOCKED GAMES! Now you can play all the awesome games in the app without any login or authentication. Enjoy the full roster of fun mini-games featuring your favorite Cartoon Network characters!

We squashed a few more minor bugs.

Keep sending us your feedback, and we'll keep making the Cartoon Network App better and better!

With our new Mix feature, it's easier than ever to jump right into watching your favorite shows! Just tell us which shows you like, and we'll build a personalized video mix just for you. Rate the videos you watch, and your mix will get even better!

See it first on the Cartoon Network app with exclusive premieres! You'll get to see select premiere episodes before they even hit the air, and watch brand-new shorts you can't get anywhere else!

Enjoy more unlocked episodes than ever before! We're adding even more full-length episodes you can watch without any login or authentication, and our new design puts them right at your fingertips. It's never been easier to find and watch unlocked episodes of your favorite Cartoon Network shows!

Let us know what you think of the new Cartoon Network app!

Fixed a bug that caused some users to load a white screen instead of the app.

Let us know what you think of the new Cartoon Network app!

We added even more exclusive content you can’t see anywhere else, and we're continuing to fine-tune your video experience.

Let us know what you think of the new Cartoon Network app!
Bug fixes.

Two-minute episode previews! Now you can check out the first two minutes of any episode, even if you're not logged in. If you like what you see, it's easy to log in and watch the full episode.

We've also optimized the app for iOS9!

Let us know what you think of the new Cartoon Network app!

Watch now, watch later! Log in with your TV provider info, and you can play, pause and resume videos across all your mobile devices. You can pick up right where you left off, even if you've moved to a different device!

Bouncy icons will tell you when we feature See It First and other surprises from your favorite shows. Now you'll always be in the know about the latest and greatest stuff!
Keep sending us your feedback so we can make the Cartoon Network app better than ever!

More unlocked episodes! Now you can enjoy an even bigger selection of full episodes. Check back often for new episodes of your favorite shows!

As always, let us know what you think of the Cartoon Network app!

We've made it even easier to manage your custom Mix. Feel like changing things up? In the mood for something different? No problem! Now you can adjust your favorite shows directly from your Mix, so you'll get an even more personalized experience. Just tap the “Edit” button above or at the end of your Mix to pull up the full list of Cartoon Network shows. From there, it’s easy to change your likes and dislikes to modify your Mix exactly how you want.

We’re also adding even more unlocked full episodes every week! Unlocked episodes are swapped out weekly, so check back often for new full episodes from your favorite shows!

As always, let us know what you think of the Cartoon Network app!

Opt-in notifications will let you know when we add new full episodes and other awesome stuff from your favorite shows. Now you'll never miss the latest and greatest content! Just visit your favorite show's page in the All Shows section and tap the bell icon in the upper left corner to turn on notifications for that show.

Keep sending us your feedback so we can make the Cartoon Network app better and better!

We've done some fine-tuning to get you into your favorite shows faster than ever. And we're constantly adding new full episodes of your favorite shows, so there's always something to discover.

We've also made it even easier to let us know what you think. Now you can send us feedback right in the app!

We've done some fine-tuning to get you into your favorite shows faster than ever. And we're constantly adding new full episodes of your favorite shows, so there's always something to discover.

We've also made it even easier to let us know what you think. Now you can send us feedback right in the app!

Don't miss the brand-new Ben 10 series! Watch it—and all your other favorite Cartoon Network shows—in the Cartoon Network App.

We've added support for the new TV App from Apple! Now the Cartoon Network App supports single sign-on, a new feature of Apple TV and iOS. That means you only have to sign in once to enjoy immediate access to all your favorite video channel apps. Once you sign into one network app, any other app from participating pay-TV providers will automatically log you into all other supported apps requiring authentication.

Long story short, this will make login faster and easier for your TV channel apps!

As always, let us know what you think of the Cartoon Network app!

Chromecast! Yes, we've added one of the most requested features: the ability to stream Cartoon Network episodes from the app directly to your TV using Chromecast. Just plug in your Chromecast media streaming device, open the Cartoon Network app on your phone or tablet, and then tap the Cast button to see your favorite shows on the big screen.

We've also added iMessage stickers! Make all your messages more fun with stickers featuring your favorite Cartoon Network characters.
Be sure to send us your feedback so we can keep making the Cartoon Network app better and better!

Don’t miss the brand new Unikitty series! Watch it and all your other favorite Cartoon Network shows in the Cartoon Network App.

More full episodes! We’re constantly adding new full episodes of your favorite shows, so there’s always something to discover. Keep sending us your feedback so we can make the Cartoon Network app better and better!

Your viewing experience becomes even more enjoyable with personalized recommendations based on your favorite shows. Whenever you visit the All Shows section, look on the left side to find special content recommended just for you!

Don't miss the brand-new Ben 10 series! Watch it and all your other favorite Cartoon Network shows in the Cartoon Network App.

More full episodes! We're constantly adding new full episodes of your favorite shows, so there's always something to discover. Keep sending us your feedback so we can make the Cartoon Network app better and better!

Don’t miss the brand new Unikitty series! Watch it and all your other favorite Cartoon Network shows in the Cartoon Network App.

Don’t miss the brand new Unikitty series! Watch it and all your other favorite Cartoon Network shows in the Cartoon Network App.

More full episodes! We’re constantly adding new full episodes of your favorite shows, so there’s always something to discover. Keep sending us your feedback so we can make the Cartoon Network app better and better!
Bug fixes

Our fresh new look makes it easier than ever for you to find content from your favorite shows.

We’ve listened to your feedback and streamlined the design in a few places where you were having trouble.

Last but not least: Check out our brand-new series, Craig of the Creek! Watch it and all your other favorite shows in the Cartoon Network App!

Select from any of your favorite Cartoon Network shows to build a personalized video mix just for you! Don’t miss the brand-new Summer Camp Island series! Watch it and all your other favorite Cartoon Network shows in the Cartoon Network App.

JOKES! Now we’re serving up jokes to tickle your funny bone in between episodes.

We’ve also made it easier than ever to manage your custom video Mix and discover new shows. In the mood for something new? Now you can add favorite shows directly from your Mix!

Home-based authentication for Xfinity customers! Xfinity subscribers will now automatically be logged in when connected to their in-home Wifi.

We’re constantly adding new full episodes from your favorite shows, so check back often as there’s always something new to discover!
Don't miss the brand new Infinity Train series! Watch it and all your other favorite Cartoon Network shows in the Cartoon Network App.
Don’t miss the brand new Victor and Valentino series! Watch it and all your other favorite Cartoon Network shows in the Cartoon Network App.
Be sure to check out our new marathon streams where you can watch even more episodes streaming live!

We’ve redesigned the app with an awesome new feature called “New for You,” a personalized list of episodes suggested just for you! We make sure it’s jammed full of the latest and greatest content from all your favorite shows, and it comes up right away every time you visit the app.

If you’re in the mood to binge watch a bunch of episodes from just one show, we made that easier, too! Just tap on any show you like, and you can quickly see everything we have to offer.

Let us know what you think about the new features in the Cartoon Network app!
Be sure to check out our new marathon streams where you can watch even more episodes streaming live!

Catch up on full episodes from your favorite Cartoon Network shows like Teen Titans Go!, The Amazing World of Gumball, We Bare Bears, and Craig of the Creek! New episodes added every week!
